CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 29, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "My, My! - Mildred Allen epitomizes the ideal type of girl anyone would like to come home to. Upholding the Pittsburgh District's reputation for beautiful women, this lovely is a Homestead product, which makes those citizens say, 'I told you so.' - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mildred Allen posed on step of Falk School, University of Pittsburgh, Oakland
